title: seek3r
author: seek3r
created_time: December 16, 2022, 06:42:11 AMLast edit: August 13, 2024, 09:03:33 AM by seek3r
content: Since the first auction of this item didn't go so well and the winner didn't get back to me, I would like to put it in again.I gave the actual winner a generous deadline - but unfortunately nothing happened.Don't worry - he's not entitled to anything as I haven't received any BTC yet either. You can find more information here -> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5425849.msg61441485#msg61441485Up for sale is a 1 Million Satoshi Gold bar  which was made by Alpencoin and comes with the COA. This bar was limited to 100 pieces and sold out very quick. For more details use this reference by Alpencoin himself or the attached pictures.STARTING BID: 0.01 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0005 BTC END TIME: December 23th, 2022, 23:59:59 GMT+1 (Hamburg time)TIMER: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?p0=307&iso=20221223T235959&year=2022&month=12&day=23&hour=23&min=59&sec=59&msg=1%20Million%20Satoshi%20Gold%20BarAUCTION TERMSSNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: I only accept Bitcoin.Payment has to be done within 24 hours after the auction has ended.SHIPPING: WORLDWIDEShipping costs will be paid by the winner, winner is also responsible for any local customs/duties/VAT fees.Item will be shipped from Germany.ESCROW: Accepted at buyers expense - would prefer minerjones' service*** I also reserve the right to exclude anyone from bidding if they got a bunch of negative trust. ***

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: dammit i really need one of these to trade someone else for #76 but my spending is frozen - got a new printer coming in 2 months or less and gotta save up to pay for it lol glwa and I hope another one comes up after I get this printer paid for
